custom-sql.sql: SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid ,'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid, categoryvalue as value , 'C-'||categoryvalue as code_ FROM md_category;
SELECT subcategoryid as masterdataid , subcategoryvalue as value , 'SC-'||subcategoryvalue as code_ , 'SC-'||subcategoryid as referenceid FROM md_subcategory where categorydataid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid ,'C-'||typeid as referenceid, 'C-'||typevalue as code_, typevalue as value FROM md_type;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||deliverymodevalue as code_, deliverymodevalue as value FROM md_deliverymode;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||filecodevalue as code_, filecodevalue as value FROM md_filecode;
SELECT basicheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheadid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM md_basichead;
SELECT primaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_primaryhead where basicheadid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheadid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_secondaryhead where primaryheadid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheadid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value ,tertiaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_tertiaryhead where secondaryheadid = ?;
SELECT organizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationcode as code_ FROM md_organization ;

SELECT suborganizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationid as referenceid ,'C-'||suborganizationvalue as code_ , suborganizationvalue as value FROM md_suborganization where organizationid = ?;
SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptcategoryvalue as value FROM md_receiptcategory;

SELECT receiptsubcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value FROM md_receiptsubcategory where receiptcategorydataid = ?;
SELECT countryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countryid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countrycode as code_ FROM md_country ;
SELECT stateid as masterdataid , 'C-'||stateid as referenceid , statecode as code_ ,statevalue as value FROM md_state where countryid = ?;
SELECT basicheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheadid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM md_basichead where basicheadid = ? ;
SELECT primaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_primaryhead where primaryheadid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheadid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_secondaryhead where secondaryheadid = ?;
SELECT tertiaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||tertiaryheadid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadvalue as code_ FROM md_tertiaryhead where tertiaryheadid = ?;
SELECT count(*) FROM public.jet_process_docfile where userpostid = ?;
SELECT count(*) FROM public.jet_process_receipt where userpostid = ?;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid , filecodevalue as value , filecodevalue as code_ FROM md_filecode where filecodeid = ? ;
SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid , categoryvalue as value , categoryvalue as code_ FROM md_category where categorydataid = ? ;
SELECT subcategoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||subcategoryid as referenceid , subcategoryvalue as value , subcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_subcategory where subcategoryid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||typeid as referenceid , typevalue as value , typevalue as code_ FROM md_type where typeid = ? ;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid , deliverymodevalue as value , deliverymodevalue as code_ FROM md_deliverymode where deliverymodeid = ? ;
SELECT organizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationvalue as code_ FROM md_organization where organizationid = ? ;
SELECT suborganizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationid as referenceid , suborganizationvalue as value , suborganizationvalue as code_ FROM md_suborganization where suborganizationid = ? ;
SELECT countryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countryid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countryvalue as code_ FROM md_country where countryid = ? ;
SELECT stateid as masterdataid , 'C-'||stateid as referenceid , statevalue as value , statevalue as code_ FROM md_state where stateid = ? ;

SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , receiptcategoryvalue as value , receiptcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_receiptcategory where receiptcategorydataid = ? ;

SELECT receiptsubcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategorydataid as referenceid , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value , receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_receiptsubcategory where receiptsubcategorydataid = ? ;
